property.name: Card Text
property.value: If it is NIGHT, each character you control cannot be chosen as the only target of an event card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Raise the cost for opponents to play NIGHT cards by 1. Action: Exhaust Flood Lights to reduce the cost of the next DAY card you play this phase by 1 (to a minimum of 1).

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If it is NIGHT, Twila Katherine Price gains: "Action: Exhaust Twila Katherine Price and pay 2 to resolve the effect of the story card to which Twila Katherine Price is committed."

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Attach to a character you control. Attached character gains the DREAMER subtype. If attached character is a unique character, it does not exhaust to commit to stories.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If it is DAY, Gregory Gry gains WILLPOWER and TOUGHNESS +2. If there are no DREAMER characters in play, Gregory Gry gains "Action: Pay 1 to ready Greagory Gry."

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Attach to a character you control. Action: Exhaust Clover Club Deck and pay 2 to look at an opponent's hand. Choose and discard one card from that hand. Then, that player draws one card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Lower the cost to play Bokrug by 1 (to a minimum of 1). If you control a single ANCIENT ONE character, count its skill and icons at any story to which Beings of Ib is committed.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Raise the cost for opponents to play DAY cards by 1. Action: Exhaust Everlasting Night to reduce the cost of the next NIGHT card you play this phase by 1 (to a minimum of 1).

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Play only if it is NIGHT. Action: Until the end of the phase, @ icons do not protect characters from insality.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Play only if it is NIGHT. Action: Choose a character. That character goes insane, if able. Otherwise, return it to the top of its owner's deck.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After Puj-Dunk is wounded, put a GUG character into play from your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Choose a non-ANCIENT ONE character card attached to one of your domains as a resource. Put that card into play under your control. If that character is still in play at the end of the phase, attach it to any of your domains as a resource.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If it is DAY, sacrifice Twilight Cannibal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Sacrifice Dhole Tunnel to choose a story card. Until the end of the phase, characters do not exhaust to commit to that story.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If it is DAY, Furtive Zoog gains %. If it is NIGHT, Furtive Zoog gains @. Response: After you drain a domain to which Furtive Zoog is attached as a resource, unattach Furtive Zoog from that domain and put it into play.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Until the end of the phase, treat all DAY and all NIGHT cards currently in play as if their text boxes were blank. Then, draw a card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: After The Day Dreamer comes into play, destroy all NIGHT cards. Action: Pay 2 to put The Day Dreamer into play from your hand. If The Day Dreamer is still in play at the end of the phase, sacrifice it.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: After Dreamlands Wanderer comes into play, destroy all DAY cards. Action: Pay 2 to put Dreamlands Wanderer into play from your hand, If Dreamlands Wanderer is still in play at the end of the phase, sacrifice it.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: After The Rays of Dawn comes into play, destroy all NIGHT cards. Each non-unique character loses a @ icon.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: After The Setting Sun comes into play, Destroy all DAY cards. Each non-unique character loses an % icons.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: If it is DAY, pay 2 to choose a story. Until the end of the phase, count The Captain's icons and skill towards that story without committing him to that story.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Attach to an _ character. Attached character gains #. Action: Exhaust Prize Pistol and pay 1 to choose and wound one character with lower skill than the number of # icons attached character has.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Destroy all NIGHT cards in play and attach Daybreak! to a story card. (Counts as an ENVIRONMENT support card with the text: "DAY. It is DAY. @ struggles do not resolve at this story.")

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Discard a resource from a domain you control to ready Obsessive Insomniac. Action: Exhaust Obsessive Insomniac to draw one card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Attach to a character you control. Action: Exhaust Dreamlore Documents to choose one subtype other than DREAMER or DREAMLANDS. Until the end of the phase, cards of the chosen subtype cost an additional 2 to play from their owner's hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Opponents play with the top card if their deck revealed. Response: After an opponent places a success token at a story, that player draws one card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Look at one opponent's hand and discard up to 2 non-unique character cards from that hand. Then, that player draws a card for each character discarded in this manner.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Sacrifice one DEEP ONE character to destroy all DAY cards in play. Then, attach Day of the Deep Ones to a DEEP ONE character. Counts as an ATTACHMENT Support card with the text:"NIGHT. It is NIGHT."

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Disrupt: Cancel the effects of a DAY card just played. Then, shuffle that card back into its owner's deck.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If a player has no story cards in his won story pile, that player's characters enter play exhausted. Action: Pay 2 to sacrifice The Seventy Steps.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If a player has 2 story cards in his won story pile, that player's characters enter play exhausted. Action: Pay 2 to sacrifice The Seven Hundred Steps.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After Enraged Gug is wounded, choose and wound one character with a # icon.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If it is DAY, Gug characters you control gain TOUGHNESS +1.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Sacrifice Ghoul Spawn to put one GHOUL character into play from your hand. Use this effect only if it is NIGHT.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Play only if it is NIGHT. Action: Choose a unique non-ANCIENT ONE character in any discard pile, and put it into play under your control with Back From the Dead attached. (Counts as an ATTACHMENT Support card with the text: "If Back From the Dead leaves play or if it becomes DAY, sacrifice attached character.")

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After you drain a domain to which Secretive Zoog is attached as a resource, unattach Secretive Zoog from that domain and put it into play to choose one other ZOOG card you control. Attach that card to any of your domains.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If you control more DREAMLANDS support cards than each individual opponent, @ icons do not protect characters from insanity.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If you control Nasht, Kaman-Thah gains +3 skill, and # $.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If you control Kaman-Thah, Nasht gains +3 skill and @ %.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Sacrifice Slime Mold to wound all wounded characters.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust a HEROIC character you control to choose and exhaust a VILLAINOUS character.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Disrupt: Cancel the effects of a NIGHT card just played. Then, shuffle that card back into its owner's deck.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Pay 1 and exhaust a DREAMER character to look at the top 3 cards pf your deck. Put 1 of those cards in your hand, and the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Play only if it is not DAY. Action: Put a { character with at least 1 $ icon into play from your hand. At the end of the phase, return that character to your hand if it is still in play.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After an opponent draws a card as the result of a card effect, exhaust Petty Thief to discard 1 card at random from that player's hand if that player has more cards in hand than you.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Choose a unique } character. Until the end of the phase that character gains #, +1 skill, and TOUGHNESS +1. Then, you may pay 1 to return Ritual Initiation to your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After an opponent's character leaves play, put Dreamlands Fanatic into play from your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Destroy all DAY cards, then attach Midnight Rendezvous to a story. Counts as an ENVIRONMENT support card with the text: "NIGHT. It is NIGHT. % struggles do not resolve at this story."

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If you control more DREAMLANDS support cards than any opponent, The Cavern of Flame gains: "Action: Exhaust The Cavern of Flame to choose a non-DREAMER character committed to a story. Ready that character, and remove it from the story."

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After a Forced Response is triggered, sacrifice Dream Parasite to trigger that Forced Response again.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After Laboring Gug is wounded, draw 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If it is NIGHT, resolve all # struggles before all @ struggles at any story to which a GUG characte is committed.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Ghoulish Predator cannot commit to stories while it is DAY.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Choose and destroy a LOCATION support card. Then, put Dhole Attack! into play as a MONSTER character with 3 skill and @ @ # #. At the end of the phase, sacrifice Dhole Attack.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After you drain a domain to which Ancient Zoog is attached as a resource, unattach Ancient Zoog from that domain and attach it to a non-ZOOG character. (Counts as an ATTACHMENT ZOOG support card with the text: "Attached character gains the DREAMER subtype and $.")

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After you draw a ZOOG character, exhaust Zoog Burrow to reveal that card to each opponent and attach it as a resource to one of your domains. Then, you may immediately drain that domain to draw 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If it is NIGHT, reduce the cost to play The Night by 3. If it is NIGHT, treat all exhausted non-unique characters as if their printed text boxes were blank.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Attached character gains #. (@ # # $ instead if attached character is a DREAMER). Action: Pay 1 to unattach Dream Dagger, and attach it to a different character you control.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If it is NIGHT, reduce the cost to play Blasphemous Dreams by 2. Action: Ready a DREAMER character you control to choose and exhaust a non-DREAMER character.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If it is NIGHT, reduce the cost to play Assist Dreamer by 2. Action: Choose and ready a unique character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains the DREAMER subtype and $ $ $.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Reduce the cost for you to play ATTACHMENT support cards on John Henry Price by 1. Response: After you play an Attachment support card on John Henry Price, draw 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust Price Manor to take the topmost ATTACHMENT support card in your discard pile and add it to your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Randolph Carter gains TOUGHNESS +1 for each DREAMLANDS support card you control. Disrupt: Pay 3 to resolve an additional skill check (immediately after the initial skill check) at any story to which Randolph Carter is committed. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Disrupt: Play when you would draw cards from your deck. Instead of drawing cards from your deck, draw the same number of cards from the top of your discard pile. Then, place Arcane Translation at the bottom of your deck.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After you succeed at a story at which King Kuranes was committed, choose a DREAMLANDS support card controlled by an opponent and take control of that card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Each player draws 1 additional card during his standard draw phase action.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Reduce the cost to play Cerenerian Deep One ny 1 for each DREAMLANDS support card you control.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Attach Dark Quagmire to a story card. Dark Quagmire cannot be chosen as the only target of a triggered effect. At the beginning of each player's story phase, that player must remove one of his success tokens from attached story.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Forced Response: After Victoria's Protege comes into play, return 1 ] character to its owner's hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Choose an opponent's character. That opponent must choose and exhaust another character he or she controls. Then, wound the character with the lower skill.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Disrupt: Exhaust Guardian of the Key to cancel 1 effect that chooses a support card as a target.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Attach to a story card. Readied characters cannot commit to attached story. Exhausted characters can commit to attached story. Forced Response: After a character commits to attached story, ready that character.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If it is DAY, sacrifice Ghoulish Hag. If it is NIGHT, Ghoulish Hag can be played from your discard pile as it if were in your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If you control more DREAMLANDS locations than each opponent, The Vale of Pnath gains: "Disrupt: When an icon struggle resolves, exhaust The Vale of Pnath to cancel the game effects of that struggle."

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Halflings of D'haz can only commit to stories on your turn. The loser of any # struggle in which Halflings of D'haz participated must receive an additional wound for each icon by which the struggle was lost.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After you drain a domain to wich Curious Zoog is attached as a resource, unattach Curious Zoog from that domain and return it to your hand to look at the top card of each player's deck. You may discard those cards or put them back on top of their owner's decks.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Attach to a non-ANCIENT ONE character. Attached character cannot trigger its effects.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If you control more DREAMLANDS support cards than any opponent, you may exhaust Guardian Pillar to commit it to a story as a character with 4 skill, @ # # #, and INVULNERABILITY.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Attach to a character you control. Action: Exhaust the Book of Black Stones to discard the top card of each player's deck.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: The player who controls the fewest DREAMLANDS support cards must play with the top card of his deck revealed.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust Sleep Therapist to choose and ready a DREAMER character.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character cannot commit to stories.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After The Woman of His Dreams is readied as the result of an $ struggle, choose and ready a non-ANCIENT ONE character.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Discard the top card of an opponent's deck. Then, that player must choose and sacrifice a card from the same faction if able.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Forced Response: After Clove Club Executive enters play, the player with the most cards in hand must randomly discard 2 cards from his hand. (In case of tie, no cards are discarded.)

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After a player wins a story card, sacrifice Clover Club Cardroom to have each player shuffle his hand back into his deck. Then, each player draws 6 cards.

property.name: Descriptor
property.value: The Flower of the Charnel Garden

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After an opponent's character leaves play, ready Princess Zura. Then, draw a card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Each player sacrifices all non-unique characters he controls.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: After an opponent wins a story card, sacrifice Ward Phillips. Disrupt: Exhaust Ward Phillips to cancel the effects of a character ability that has just been triggered.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Choose a non-conspiracy story card in play, and exchange that story card with a non-conspiracy story card in your won story pile. (Any success tokens remain in place at the newly placed story card.)

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After Wandering Gug is wounded, discard the top from any player's deck.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Discard a wound token from an exhausted GUG character you control to ready that character.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: It is NIGHT. Discard all DAY cards from play after you play Shuggob from your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Return any number of MI-GO characters from your discard pile to your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After you drain a domain to which Inconspicuous Zoog is attached as a resource, unattach Inconspicuous Zoog from that domain and attach it to a story card. (Counts as an ATTACHMENT ZOOG support card with the text: "Count Inconspicuous Zoog's skill and icons at attached story each time it resolves. If you win this story, return Inconspicuous Zoog to your hand.")

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Forced Response: At the end of your turn. deal 2 wounds to all other characters you control or sacrifice Basilisk.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Richard Upton Pickman gains the icons of each attached GHOUL character. If Richard Upton Pickman would be wounded, you may discard an attached GHOUL character instead. Action: Pay 2 to attach a GHOUL character to Richard Upton Pickman from your hand or discard pile.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If you control more DREAMLANDS support cards than any opponent, reduce the cost to play Moon-Beast Captain by 2.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If you control more DREAMLANDS support cards than any opponent, refresh all DREAMER characters at the beginning of each player's turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Play at the end of your story phase. Action: Choose up to 2 characters. Those characters do not refresh during the next refresh phase.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Disrupt: Exhaust Agency Bodyguard to cancel 1 wound dealt to a unique character.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust The White Ship to choose a character you control that is committed to a story. Until the end of the phase, that character gains +2 skill and FAST. If you succeed at that story, search your deck for a DREAMLANDS support card, reveal it to your opponent, and add it to your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After you succeed at a story at which Twila Katherine Price is committed, exhaust Twila Katherine Price to look at each opponent's hand, and choose 1 card to discard from those hands.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Attach to a story card. Disrupt: If an opponent would claim his fifth success token on this story, place Dreaming of the Past on the bottom of your deck to prevent that success token from being claimed.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust Gregory Gry to shuffle the top 2 cards of any discard pile back into their owner's deck.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After an opponent plays a character, that opponent must immediately drain another domain or return that character to his hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Play only if it is NIGHT. Action: Attach Mnomquah's Serpent to a character. Counts as a Curse attachment with the text: "NIGHT. Attached character cannot commit to stories. Attached character's controller must randomly discard a card from his hand at the end of each of his turns."

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If it is NIGHT, Mnomquah is unaffected by all story and conspiracy card effects. Response: After you succeed at a story card to which Mnomquah is committed, discard an opponent's success token from that story.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust Keeper of Dreams to choose a character. That character loses WILLPOWER until the end of the phase unless its controller discards 1 card at random from his hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After Magah Bird enters play, search your deck for a character named Magah Bird and put it into play.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After Gug Sentinel is wounded, choose and exhaust 1 opponent's character.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After you succeed at a story, exhaust The Tower of Koth to choose and wound 1 MONSTER character.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Dhole Ant-Lion does not exhaust to commit to story cards if it has no wounds. Force Response: At the end of each story phase, sacrifice 1 character you control or wound Dhole Ant-Lion.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Attach to a character. Response: After a > character you control is wounded, wound attached character.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After you drain a domain to which Stealthy Zoog is attached as a resource, unattach Stealthy Zoog from that domain and attach it to a story. (Counts as an ATTACHMENT ZOOG support card with the text: "If attached story is won. its effect must resolve.")

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: During the Story phase, pay 3 to put The Cats of Ulthar into play from your hand, committed to a story of your choice. Action: Pay 1 to destroy 1 ZOOG card in play. Then, return The Cats of Ulthar to your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: During the resource phase, if an opponent wishes to attach a resource to a domain, the resource must be chosen at random from his hand. (Choose the domain first, then randomly determine the resource.)

card.name: The Light Side of the Moon

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If it is DAY, the cost to play The Light Side of the Moon is 0. Response: After an opponent wins a story card, each player chooses up to 3 characters he controls. Shuffle all characters not chosen back into their owner's decks.

card.name: The Dark Side of the Moon

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If it is NIGHT, the cost to play The Dark Side of the Moon is 0. Response: After an opponent wins a story card, each player chooses a character controlled by one of his opponents. Shuffle all chosen characters back into their owner's decks.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust Unknown Kadath to choose an opponent. That opponent must choose a DAY or NIGHT card in your discard pile and return it to your hand.
